name: Travel Makeup Bag with LED Mirror, Large 12 Inch Cosmetic Train Case with Jewelry Organizer, 10X Magnifying Mirror, Adjustable Dividers for Cosmetics Makeup Brushes Toiletry, Includes 6 Velvet Pouches
short_description: All-in-One Vanity & Organizer: This spacious makeup organizer bag stores all your beauty essentials in one sleek unit. The top has a soft-lined jewelry compartment, while the bottom features adjustable dividers for brushes, palettes, and skincare. It eliminates clutter and keeps everything tidy and accessible—ideal for daily use and travel

Professional LED Mirror with Customizable Lighting: Our travel make up organizer features a detachable LED mirror with 3 color temperatures (white, warm, natural) and adjustable brightness. It provides perfect, salon-quality lighting for flawless makeup application anywhere, even in low-light conditions. Use it attached or separately for ultimate convenience

Portable & Travel-Ready, with Thoughtful Extras: This travel makeup organizer includes a 10X magnifying mirror that attaches securely to the main mirror for detailed work and can be detached to carry alone. It also comes with 6 velvet pouches in 3 sizes (4.6"x3.9", 6.9"x5.5", 9.7"x8.2") for organizing small items. Despite its large capacity, the case remains portable with a sturdy handle and lightweight construction, perfect for travel and daily commutes

Smart, Modular Design for Total Customization: Fully customizable interior with removable dividers and a repositionable jewelry tray. Adapt the layout to fit everything from travel-sized items to full-sized products. Easy to clean and reorganize as your collection changes

Powerful Built-in Battery for Cordless Convenience: The LED mirror of this big travel organize box is powered by a 2000mAh rechargeable battery, offering 2-3 hours of cordless use. USB charging makes it easy to power up anywhere—perfect for travel, photoshoots, or on-the-go touch-ups

Premium PU Material & Easy-Clean Interior: Made from high-quality, water-resistant PU with a durable, wipe-clean interior. Reinforced stitching and sturdy zippers ensure long-lasting use, keeping your case looking pristine even with daily use
